title: The Evil Dead- The Epic Edit
description:
The Evil Dead: The Epic Edit- 720p Version

A week ago I posted an edit of the The Evil Dead Franchise on my blog that combined all three movies as seamlessly as possible. The post gives detail on how and why I constructed every edit in an attempt to create one cohesive story. 

You can find the original post here:

The edit contains elements of The Evil Dead, Evil Dead 2, Army of Darkness,
Army of Darkness: Directors Cut, Evil Dead: Hail To The King (video game), and Evil Dead: Fistful of Boomstick (video game).

Enjoy
